pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 1, 2016:

Beijing, People’s Republic of China

7:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will visit the Great Wall of China  

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Shanghai, People’s Republic of China

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Shanghai, People’s Republic of China

Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet His Excellency Yang Xiong, Mayor of the City of Shanghai

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will address the Canada China Business Council

Jing An Grand Ballroom, 5th floor
Jing An Shangri-La Hotel

Notes for media:

  • Remarks Open for Coverage


Please note: all times are local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
